resources.string: We should sanitize hands thoroughly to prevent Coronavirus from spreading.
Basking in the sun kills the Virus.
More than 1/16 of the human population is infected.
Humans can get the Coronavirus from cats and dogs.
Coronavirus is a type of virus which causes an infection in Nose, Sinuses and upper throat.
Shortness of breath is not a symptom of coronavirus.
WHO characterized COVID-19 as a pandemic.
Coronavirus was first identified in the 1960\'s
There are a total of 7 types of Coronaviruses\'.
